SENT.plain: A 44-year-old woman developed a left cerebral infarction secondary to internal carotid artery dissection 6 days after childbirth
A cesarean section had been carried out after 14 hours of strenuous unsuccessful labor
Although in the past some authors have implicated oral contraceptives as a cause for carotid dissection, carotid dissection associated with childbirth has not been previously described
